title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 850/95 of 6 April 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3366/94 laying down for 1995 certain conservation and management measures for fishery resources in the Regulatory Area as defined in the Convention on Future Multilateral Cooperation in the North West Atlantic Fisheries
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 850/95 of 6 April 1995 amending Regulation  (EC) No 3366/94 laying down for 1995 certain conservation and management measures for fishery  resources in the Regulatory Area as defined in the Convention on Future Multilateral Cooperation in  the North West Atlantic Fisheries
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Annex I of Regulation (EC) No 3366/94 shall be replaced by the Annex  to this Regulation.
All catches by Member States during 1995, prior to the adoption of this Regulation,  should be counted aganist the quota established in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 6 April 1995.
For the Council The President J. PUECH
